items.title: Buy the weakness in stocks like Tesla and Palantir as bull market has more room to run, investor says
items.description: Investors can buy the dip on some key tech stocks after this week's market losses, according to Eddie Ghabour, Key Advisors Wealth Management managing...

items.title: Time to snap up Oracle, now down more than 30% in past two months, says Carter Worth
items.description: What the charts are saying about Oracle, according to Carter Worth.

items.title: An analyst worries OpenAI will miss its 'extravagant' spending commitments. These stocks would be the most vulnerable

items.title: Tesla fell after Musk's pay package was approved. How to play the volatility with options
items.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down this options trade on Tesla after shareholders approved Elon Musk's $1 trillion package.

items.title: Tesla shareholders passed Elon Musk's $1 trillion package. What analysts are saying
items.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk's new $1 trillion pay plan consists of 12 tranches of shares that would be granted if Tesla hits certain milestones.
